body:
Comment 6 by **tarmigan**: 
Hi Alex and Russ,

I have created a very simple echo program that uses my serial port package and still
crashes (the OSX version of the package+program does not crash).

I have modified the serial_windows package that I posted before because I wasn't closing
the windows event handles before.

Please find attached the test program source and binary and the modified package.

To run the test program, you should connect two serial ports with a null-modem and then
run the program like this:
bug.exe COM3 COM4

In another post I will also attach a the panic that I get.

Please take a look and let me know if I am being unsafe with my buffer usage.  I have
poured over the microsoft documentation and don't can't see anywhere that I am being
unsafe.

Thanks,
Tarmigan
Attachments: 1. serial_windows.go (6764 bytes) 1. main.go (1033 bytes) 1. bug.exe (972288 bytes)
